.. STATES and Image Processing Pipeline documentation master file.

Welcome to the STATES and Image Processing Pipeline User Guide!
================================================================

This guide provides comprehensive information on setting up, using, and understanding the STATES (Spatially-resolved transcriptomics and translatomics employed simultaneously) analysis pipeline and the associated Image Processing Automation System.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   tutorial/index
   sample_practice/index
   api/index

==================
